author: Tom Richardson
text: Many performance evaluation systems refer to "the performance standard" upon which people are rated (usually on a five point scale). What I'm finding missing is specifics around what that standard is. Can anyone provide examples of performance standards that are SMART (Specific, Measureable, Attainable, Relevant, Timely)?
title: Performance Standards
